name: The Good Elf's
description:
Santa's Elf's is helping him making gifts. Sometimes the Elf's is naughty and Santa do really not like naughty Elf's.

How to play

This is a Christmas board game for 2-4 players. You can both play the game against your friends and your family or against the computer.

All you need to play the game is a mouse and a Windows computer.

The goal in this game to make sure that the Elf's not are naughty when it is Christmas time. So make sure when you land on or passes the Christmas field you are not naughty. But if you are naughty you will get fired and you will lose the game.

Keyboard Shortcuts

  • Press Escape to quit the game.
  • Press R to restart the game.
  • Press Spacebar to rotate top-down camera

Good luck and have fun
